Hello there!

My name is Jasmine and I guide and explore (most of the time) .

My name is Jasmine Sanjaya, I am currently living and working in Jakarta, Indonesia as both full-time tour guide and freelance Travel Experience Designer.

What can I say, I love my job! I am having trouble writing compelling texts, not to mention about myself so I will try to make this as short and informative as possible.

Let's Plan Your Adventure Follow My Journey

My Journey

From a travel enthusiast to your trusted guide through Indonesia's wonders

🌟
2018

Started My Journey

Began exploring Indonesia's hidden gems and fell in love with sustainable tourism.

🎓
2020

Became Certified Guide

Obtained professional tourism certification and started guiding small groups.

🚀
2022

Founded Jasmine Tours

Launched my own tour company focusing on authentic, personalized experiences.

❤️
2025

500+ Happy Travelers

Proud to have guided hundreds of travelers to discover Indonesia's magic.

What I Believe In

The principles that guide every tour and interaction

Authentic Experiences

I believe in showing the real Indonesia, beyond typical tourist spots.

Sustainable Tourism

Supporting local communities and protecting our beautiful environment.

Personal Touch

Every tour is tailored to your interests and travel style.

Why I Do This

Growing up in Indonesia, I discovered that our country holds some of the world's most incredible hidden treasures. From the mystical temples of Borobudur to the pristine waters of Raja Ampat, every corner tells a unique story.

But what truly moves me is connecting people with these places in meaningful ways. I don't just show you destinations – I help you experience the soul of Indonesia through local communities, authentic cuisine, and moments that become lifelong memories.

When you travel with me, you're not just a tourist. You become part of the story, contributing to local communities and taking home experiences that will change how you see the world.

Ready for Your Adventure?

Let's create unforgettable memories together in Indonesia's most beautiful destinations
